author: jwasinger
content:
hey <@892053833121923094> (and anyone else who is familiar with `execution-spec-tests`), is there a way to attempt to fill a single test case?

there are some failing selfdestruct test cases for geth and I'm trying to figure out what is going on.

author: dimitry8570
content: I try to support pyspecs with retesteth interface also, but it keep on updating so rapidly, scripts need update

author: jwasinger
content: I got it working (using https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/pull/122) with `-k` flag.

author: marioevz
content: Thanks for checking these, I did not fully check the expected outcome on these failing tests yesterday so it might be possible that the tests are incorrect, there is however a very similar test that is passing and the only difference is that the failing test is sending the funds to self
